actions.committee: Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service)
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service).

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate an inequity in computing annuities of federal law enforcement officers or firefighters.

summary.text: Stipulates that the annuity of a Federal employee retiring with at least 5 years but less than 20 years of service as a law enforcement officer or firefighter, or any combination thereof, shall be computed by multiplying 2 1/2 percent of such employee's average pay by the years of service as a law enforcement officer or firefighter.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to eliminate an inequity in computing annuities of federal law enforcement officers or firefighters.
